description: ff. 189. Dhū al-ḥijjah 1234H., Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 279 (commentary c, gloss α); SII, 302; Mach, R. Yahuda, 3241. Supergloss on the gloss of Mīr Abū al-Fatḥ (Mach, R. Yahuda, 3237 and New Series no. 272).
